CmdLine:
apk add --no-cache             xvfb             ttf-freefont             fontconfig             dbus     &&     apk add qt5-qtbase-dev             wkhtmltopdf             --no-cache             --repository http://dl-3.alpinelinux.org/alpine/edge/testing/             --allow-untrusted     &&     mv /usr/bin/wkhtmltopdf /usr/bin/wkhtmltopdf-origin &&     echo $'#!/usr/bin/env sh
Xvfb :0 -screen 0 1024x768x24 -ac +extension GLX +render -noreset & 
DISPLAY=:0.0 wkhtmltopdf-origin $@ 
killall Xvfb' > /usr/bin/wkhtmltopdf &&     chmod +x /usr/bin/wkhtmltopdf
Commands.Name: run
